title: How to Grow Glow Berries in Minecraft: Everything You Need To Know

steps.title: Obtain a Glow Berry.
steps.content: Obtain a Glow Berry. In Minecraft , Glow Berries can be obtained from Cave Vines that have Glow Berries visible on them. You can either interact with the vine to get a berry, or destroy the vine. You can also get them as chest loot in the Mineshaft or Ancient City. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place a Glow Berry on the bottom of a block.
steps.content: Place a Glow Berry on the bottom of a block. As long as there is air beneath the block, the Glow Berry will turn into a Cave Vine that grows downward.

steps.title: Use Bone Meal on a Cave Vine to cause berries to grow.
steps.content: Use Bone Meal on a Cave Vine to cause berries to grow. If the vine already has berries, you don't need to use Bone Meal on it until the vine is empty. [2] X Research source Bone Meal can be crafted with a Bone or a Bone Block.

steps.title: There are a few uses for Glow Berries.
steps.content: There are a few uses for Glow Berries. These uses are as follows: Glow Berries will restore 2 hunger when eaten. [3] X Research source If placed in a Composter, Glow Berries have a 30% chance of raising the compost level by 1. Glow Berries on a vine can be used as a light source inside of a cave. Glow Berries can be used to breed foxes , and can be used on baby foxes to reduce their grow time by 10%.
